data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 10
data.actual_result: Two emotes get added. The one you have selected and a different one.
data.expected_result: Only the selected emote should get added to the textfield.
data.short_description: Two emotes get added to the textfield when searching with the emoji picker
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the emoji picker button - Open the search there - Search for any emote and click on it
